title: Quarantine breach risk simulations — quarantine_data
text: dataset combining three simulation outputs COVIDQuarantine model (Lydeamore et al.), representing different quarantine vaccination scenarios travellers workers hotel quarantine 14 days.

title: Quarantine breach risk simulations — quarantine_data
text: data frame one row per time point scenario. Key variables   include: scenario Simulation scenario (traveller/worker vaccination status). group Whether scenario relates travellers workers. t_incubation Simulated incubation time (days) symptom onset. ... variables original simulation outputs.

text: Derived three CSV files COVIDQuarantine GitHub repository   Michael Lydeamore.
